description: This file defines a React functional component 'Header' that renders the top navigation bar of a task management web application. It includes branding, search input, task filter buttons, and a theme toggle button. It uses context to manage theme state and accepts callback props for search and filter change actions.

methods.name: Header({ onSearch, onFilterChange, currentFilter })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the header with branding, search, filter, and theme toggle features.

ctags.name: Header
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Header({ onSearch, onFilterChange, currentFilter }) {$/
